pkgmetadata.longdescription: # GEISTT Lab RTI Client for PythonPlease refer to the [GEISTT Lab RTI documentation](https://gitlab.com/geistt/lab/rti/-/wikis/home) for more information.Example usage:```pythonfrom geistt_lab_rti_client import RTI, proto, constantsrti = RTI(application="python_test")def on_connect(): print("Connected")rti.on("connect", on_connect)def on_error(channel, message, exception): print(f"Error: {channel}: {message}", file=sys.stderr)rti.on("error", on_error)def on_message(content): print(f"received: {content}")self.rti.subscribe_text("test", on_message)self.rti.publish_text("test", "foo")```
